channel.title: Gtd on Let's see what happens.
channel.description: Recent content in Gtd on Let's see what happens.

item.title: Excitement
item.description:
Another interesting insight from reading GTD is that there is a level of positive feelings you get from envisioning future results of your projects.

The level tends to go up with the clarity created by use of the process. So the need to have “artificial sweeteners” goes down.

I think that excitement is the only reasonable expectation from your projects with this system.

item.title: Getting Things Done
item.description:
There are two benefits I have got from starting reading the GTD book.

  1. The serenity that allows you to be more focused on the things at hands.
  2. Previously unstated projects have come up like a surprise.

So there is more clarity just because of these two reasons. And I eliminated some things I previously assumed to be crucial.

BTW I use org-mode to implement it. I am happy with the proccess.
